thread.section_title: Rhodes Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient, quiet location
thread.title_full: Convenient, quiet location - Review of Rhodes Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: GremlinGrrl
title: Convenient, quiet location
text:
The single room was what I expected- tiny with a single bed. It was cozy and I had a nice view of the street below, which was quiet at night.
The hotel is within walking distance of Paddington station which was a selling point for me as I was planning on using the underground for all of my transportation.
The people at the front desk were polite and professional. The continental breakfast was fresh and filling. The hotel overall seemed well-maintained.
Do be advised that there is no elevator in the hotel and there are a lot of stairs to climb if you're on one of the upper floors.
